title: Did Belauce give George Floyd's family an American flag to honor the Witnesses?
subtitle: The prosecution was circulated after Floyd's brother drew attention at a congressional hearing to racism by the U.S. police.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On June 10, 2020, the President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Pelouse Floyd, a brother of George Floyd, presented a United States flag - a gesture limited to honoring veterans.
